sourcesContent:
const audioUrlReducer = (state = './samples/bank_A/', action) => {
    const audioLibrary1 = [
        'clap1.wav',
        'clap2.wav',
        'hh1.wav',
        'hh2.wav',
        'kick1.wav',
        'kick2.wav',
        'open_hh1.wav',
        'snare1.wav',
        'snare2.wav'
    ]

    switch(action.type) {
        case 'BANK1':
            return './samples/bank_A/'
        case 'BANK2':
            return './samples/bank_B/'
        default:
            return state
    }
}

export default audioUrlReducer
